apple_vendor_description: This emoji on Apple devices portrays a tender moment between two women, both rendered with Apple's signature 3D depth and smooth, rounded edges, with one having a medium-dark skin tone and the other a dark skin tone. The gentle embrace and softly rendered lips convey affection and romance, enhanced by the realistic lighting that gives their skin a natural glow.  The glossy finish on their hair and clothing adds to the intimate and loving portrayal, making it a beautiful representation of same-sex love and partnership.
